title: Computrabajo Mexico Jobs Scraper
description: Scrape job listings from Computrabajo Mexico (https://mx.computrabajo.com) with stealth mode, pagination, and structured data extraction. Provide job category URL or search keyword.

startUrls.title: Start URLs
startUrls.description: Array of Computrabajo Mexico URLs to scrape. Example: ['https://mx.computrabajo.com/trabajo-de-asesor-de-ventas']. If empty, uses keyword to build URL.

keyword.title: Job Keyword (if not using Start URLs)
keyword.description: Job category keyword to search for. Converted to URL format: /trabajo-de-{keyword}. Examples: 'asesor-de-ventas', 'marketing', 'atencion-al-cliente'.

startUrlsText.title: Start URLs (paste newline-separated)
startUrlsText.description: Optional: paste one URL per line. This takes precedence over the `startUrls` select. Useful for free-form lists.

maxResults.title: Maximum Results
maxResults.description: Maximum number of job listings to collect from all pages.

maxPages.title: Maximum Pages to Scrape
maxPages.description: Maximum number of pagination pages to visit. Safety limit to prevent excessive scraping.

collectDetails.title: Scrape Job Details
collectDetails.description: If true, opens each job detail page to extract full HTML and text descriptions. Increases scraping time but provides richer data.

stealthMode.title: Enable Stealth Mode
stealthMode.description: If true, uses advanced anti-detection techniques: randomized delays, header rotation, session management, and intelligent caching.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Configure proxy rotation for requests. Use Apify Proxy (recommended) or custom proxies. Essential for large-scale scraping.

requestDelayMs.title: Request Delay (milliseconds)
requestDelayMs.description: Base delay between requests (in stealth mode, adds randomization). Range: 500-5000ms. Higher values reduce bot detection risk.

maxConcurrency.title: Max Concurrent Requests
maxConcurrency.description: Maximum number of parallel requests. Lower values (2-3) are stealthier; higher values (5-10) are faster but riskier.

customHeaders.title: Custom HTTP Headers (JSON)
customHeaders.description: Optional JSON object of custom HTTP headers to include in all requests. Example: {"Accept-Language": "es-MX"}
